I did not ask you to come here.
This is my Egyptian friend I met three years ago,
It may seem like an evil spirit, but it is not.
What you believed to be an evil spirit
is a powerful vision, created from your own life energy.
Because it appears next to you, that vision is called...
That is a hundred-year-old coffin pulled up from the Atlantic Ocean,
off the African coast four years ago.
After I obtained and researched it,
I found out that it was on the boat where my grandfather,
the man four generations before you, Jonathan Joestar, died.
It was apparently empty when they discovered it.
But I know exactly what was inside!
Avdol and I are trying to locate him as we speak.
He has awakened from his hundred-year sleep.
We are fated to fight him!
And on the back of his neck...
is the body of my grandfather, Jonathan Joestar,
which that bastard has taken over!
Stop clinging to your child already.
Jojo, what were you doing while you were absent from school for four days?
Why are you clinging to Jojo's arm like that?
He totally said that to me!
The tree branches must have broken his fall!
Did the tree branches cut my leg?
It was already cut before I fell!
That is why I fell down the stairs.
There is no doubt about it.
He is able to summon a pretty strong Stand.
No wonder he wants me to get rid of him.
He is no match for my Stand.
Episode 2: Who Will Be the Judge!?
If you were even fifteen centimeters off, you would have hit the flagstone.
Accidents happen all the time on these steps.
Starting tomorrow, you should hold my hand when you go down, Jojo.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
seem to have cut your left leg.
You should use this handkerchief as an emergency binding.
I have not seen you around before.
Do you go to our school?
He said his name was Kakyoin-kun.
I am the best for Jojo.
At the time, I was weakened...
Because I was only a head.
If I had not stolen Jonathan Joestar's body...
If I did not have his energy,
I would have had very little.
I never could have survived at the bottom of the ocean for a hundred years.
But this body itself is like a bond between parent and child,
and it seems to connect with his descendants.
They are aware of my existence.
The new power that I have acquired by obtaining Jonathan's body...
This Stand also affects the bodies of his descendants.
Advantages and disadvantages come hand in hand.
What is the deal with this cramped room?
This is why I hate Japan.
Avdol, how can you stand this?
This thing they call the tea ceremony.
Joestar-san, now that we know of his existence,
would not it be safe to assume that he knows about us, as well?
But if we do not know what he is going to do,
or even know what his powers are...
Jojo, how did you get that cut?
You did not get into another fight, did you?
Sensei, has Jojo ever gotten hurt in a fight?
There is no way that would happen.
Well, you have got a point.
Then I guess I will believe that you just fell, you scatterbrain.
What are you trying to do?
Well, I cannot treat you through them.
Now then, while Jojo is taking off his pants,
I will take your temperatures and prove that you are faking ill.
Jotaro Kujo, I will kill you today with my Stand!
I am waving around the thermometer to reset it.
Does this look like a pen to you?!
This thermometer actually looks like a pen to you?!
You are not going to say
that this looks like a pen, are you?!
This is not a woman's strength.
I saw something unknown crawling up from the floor earlier.
Was he the one who cut my leg on the stairs?
My Stand's possessed that nurse and is controlling her.
Attacking my Stand will mean hurting that nurse, Jojo.
Just who the hell are you?!
The name of my Stand is Hierophant Green.
I am human, but my loyalty is to him...
Now that I have dragged it out... I see...
It is just a sleazy Stand that cannot do anything but possess people.
It looks like a shiny melon.
dragging that out of her, Jojo.
Do not try to act tough.
I can see my finger marks on your forehead.
If I go ahead and crush your Stand's head like a melon,
it looks like your head will be crushed, too.
I am going to keep a grip on you for a while.
I will take you to the old man.
I am sure he would love to meet you...
And I would like to know more about Dio myself.
Green fluid is coming out of his Stand's hands?
Feel the attack of my Stand, Hierophant Green!
Do not make any weird moves!
What looked like the bodily fluids of my Stand, Hierophant Green,
was a vision of destructive energy!
It is pierced through your Stand's chest.
Therefore, your insides have been torn to shreds.
I am certain that I removed the Stand from her...
Attacking my Hierophant Green would mean hurting her.
My Stand can reach further than yours, but it does not like open spaces.
It prefers to hide within something.
If you drag it out, it gets angry.
That is why, when it came out from her throat, it hurt her.
If you had let me kill you in the first place, this nurse would not have been hurt.
You are trying to stand up?
If I were to compare you to something,
it would be a sandbag in front of of a boxer.
You stood back up only to be hit again.
I tend to overdo it with my opponents in fights,
so much that some are still in the hospital.
There was one idiot teacher who was all talk,
so I taught him a lesson, and he has not come back to school.
At restaurants that served me lousy food,
I leave without paying the bill all the time.
know nauseating evil when I see it.
Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain,
and crush them under your foot.
That is exactly what you have done!
Your Stand is not visible to the victim or the law.
The loser is the evil one.
He shrugged off the Emerald Splash?
The one who will be the judge is...
You just caught it by surprise and hurt its chest a little.
Lucky for me it is not a weak Stand,
but I have a feeling it will become more violent.
She should be fine once her wounds are treated.
It came from the nurse's office!
None of you leave the classroom!
I will leave the rest to them.
I have got to have him explain some things about Dio.
Jotaro's totally thinking about me at school right now!
I felt like I had a connection with my son just now.
I am not thinking about you.
D-Do not tell me... you did that?
It is got nothing to do with you.
I am looking for the Old Man.
Sucks having to find him in such a huge house.
I think your grandfather's in the tea room,
You will not tell me anything.
But I know that, deep down,
You look a little pale this morning.
It is too late for him.
He is not going to make it.
He will die in the next few days.
Jotaro, it is not your fault.
The reason that this man swore loyalty to Dio
This is not good at all...
Sometimes having a cold is not so bad.
I do not really understand, either.
This is the one thing I feared most!
Tell me how we should deal with this!
